48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Humaidah bint Yasir narrated from her grandmother Yusairah - and she was one of those who emigrated - she said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said to us: ‘Hold fast to At-Tasbih, At-Tahlil, and At-Taqdis, and count them upon the fingertips, for indeed they shall be questioned, and they will be made to speak. And do not become heedless, so that you forget about the Mercy (of Allah).’”

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي فَضْلِ التَّسْبِيحِ وَالتَّهْلِيلِ وَالتَّقْدِيسِ
